title: You could save this as a skill
detail: If you find yourself giving Claude the same instructions repeatedly—a particular format, a workflow, a persona—turn it into a skill. Custom skills let you package complex prompts into reusable shortcuts. Build once, use forever. Your most effective prompting patterns deserve to be captured.
surface_triggers: User provides detailed multi-step instructions. User repeats similar prompts across conversations. User describes a workflow they use frequently. User asks Claude to remember specific instructions for next time.
